text: yazunu almunafiqun 'an al'ahzab aladhin hzmhm allah taealaa sharun hazimat lm ydhhbu; dhlk min shdt alkhawf waljbn, walaw ead al'ahzab 'iilaa "almdyn" ltmnna 'uwlayik almunafiqun 'anahum kanuu ghayibin ean "almdyn" bayn aerab albadyt, ystkhbrwn ean 'akhbarakum wayus'alun ean anbaykm, walaw kanuu fikum maa qataluu maeakum 'iilaa qalilana lkthrt jbnhm wdhlthm wadief yqynhm
